title: Application slow down after midnight deployment
description: Users are reporting significant lag and occasional timeouts when accessing the main dashboard since the last update deployed at 1:00 AM UTC.

title: Request for new 'Export to CSV' feature
description: The client needs the ability to export their monthly transaction log directly to a CSV file from the reporting page.

title: Password reset link not arriving in email
description: Multiple users from Delta Group cannot receive the password reset email. Checked spam folders; still missing.

title: Minor typo correction on 'Contact Us' page
description: The word 'recieved' is misspelled as 'recievd' on the main contact form submission success page.

title: Database connection failing intermittently
description: System logs show periodic connection timeouts (Error 500) to the primary database, affecting data retrieval every few hours.

title: UI adjustment: Align button on settings page
description: The 'Save Changes' button on the account settings page is misaligned by 5px to the left in Chrome browser.

title: Training session request for new features
description: The client needs a dedicated 1-hour session to go over the recently implemented Q3 feature set.

title: User cannot upload files larger than 5MB
description: Upload functionality is failing for files exceeding 5MB, despite documentation stating the limit is 10MB.

title: Feature enhancement: Add filtering to audit log
description: Add filter options to the audit log (by user, date range, and action type) for easier searching.

title: System crash after attempting bulk delete operation
description: Attempting to delete more than 100 records simultaneously results in a fatal application crash.

title: Incorrect calculation in monthly revenue report
description: The 'Total Revenue' figure in the November report is off by approximately 2% compared to manual calculations.

title: API documentation updates needed for v2.1
description: The public-facing API documentation has not been updated to reflect the new endpoints introduced in version 2.1.
